Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council unit incorporating Sheaf Training and Red Tape Central. Offers training in a wide variety of vocational areas, including Administration, Child Care, Care of the Older Person, Construction, Customer Service, Horticulture, Hospitality, Information Technology, and Painting and Decorating. Training is available to people aged 14-16 years (referral from school or Children and Young People's Directorate) and 16+ (self or any referral), including Foundation Learning, National Vocational Qualifications, Apprenticeships and Advanced Apprenticeships. It is available to people who are in employment who wish to improve their current skills or people who are not working who wish to learn new skills or update existing ones.
